long_description: hi, i'm kelsey jordan, founder and creative director of kgd films. i started this company with the intention of making videos accessible and affordable for small businesses all the while keeping their look professional, sustainable and evergreen. this company was born out of my passion for two things: small business and film. we will not only shoot and edit your video content, we will help you implement your videos effectively on social media platforms, your website, in email marketing & more. kgd films is available to shoot in pa, nj, ny, de and willing to travel beyond the local area as well. every video you put into the world should tell a story. use the power of tiktok and instagram reels videos to create content for your ever-growing audience. kgd films can deliver vertical video content from brainstorming to shooting to editing, posting and more. we can even repurpose older content to create fresh new videos for the modern era. from preloaded content calendars to monthly consultations, we will help grow your social media presence and introduce you to new customers each and every day.

long_description:
this company was born out of my passion for two things: small business and film. while big name companies like amazon are taking the average shopping experience to a whole new level online, (sometimes through the use of video) small businesses need a way to step up their marketing game. i am confident that video is the answer. there are a multitude of analytical and seo-related reasons as to why it is so crucial, but let me bore you with that another day. video content allows potential customers (and current ones) to see you as the expert in the field, to see your gorgeous storefront and to see who you are as a human being. i also have a growing love for wedding videography. seeing and capturing the happiest day of many couples' lives is truly an honor and i love creating a story out of their day. take a look around my site and please reach out with any questions you may have. you can reach me via in
mail or by emailing me at kelsey@kgdfilms.com
